translation: He who takes the Self to be the slayer and he who thinks it is slain, neither of them knows. It does not slay, nor is it slain.
commentary: 2.19 who he who? Anam this (Self)? Vetti knows? The killer slayer? who he who? f and? Anam this? Thinks thinks? killed slain? Ubhau both? So those? Not not? Vijanitah know? Not not? This is this? kills slays? Not not? Hanyate is slain.Commentary -- The Self is nondoer (Akarta) and as It is immutable? It is neither the agent nor the object of the act of slaying.
